name: Happy BBQ 4- single-player simulation games
description:
【Thank you for accompanying us for 3 years】

◆Happy BBQ , the world's most popular single-player simulation game 3 years ago!At the request of players,Happy BBQ 4 is on your iPhone ,iPod,and iPad!Thank you very much, every player!We will continue to work hard in the future to update the game.

—————————What's new—————————
【New gameplay】
O(∩_∩)O the player roast food more easily and more interesting!

【New function】
(○^～^○) You can upgrade the restaurant now!

【New challenge】
(^ ▽ ^) In the game,we will record the highest score of the player,so challenge yourself to try something new.

【New rank】
(＝^ω^＝) Game Center support.The top 10 of the player's name will be displayed real time in the game.Who is the most powerful player?

【More】
＼( ^▽^ )／ And..... more to come!
